content: I remember what Facebook attempted to do which is basically offer a “Facebook portal” under the guise of free Internet which was a scummy tactic at best. This was done in Africa as well. This is a great article on describing grassroots advocacy and I appreciate this. Seems like you have a bigger battle on your hands now with “transaction neutrality” where greedy mobile payment providers are coming around to take advantage of the informal economy exploitation, another fight we see targeting India as well as Nigeria and other developing nations.
